description: Yosshi Miyoshi is Kaya`s father and Akito`s father-in-law. He`s a real estate agent and also a karate instructor. He is Nobuhiro`s friend when in high school. Like Nobuhiro, he also have s crush in Miho`s mother, Miyuki. He tried to confess with her once but he got rejected. When Akito met Kaya and her parents to discuss about he will marry Kaya, Yosshi start to talking about Nobuhiro`s death (but he didn`t mention him directly) and realized they knew he`s talking about Nobuhiro and Akito is Moritaka`s partner. Later he ask to call Moritaka over and the three went to a restaurant where Yosshi explained his past with Nobuhiro and Miyuki, and eventually decided to support Moritaka and Akito in their dreams coming true, and gave Akito permission to marry Kaya, even offering to get him an apartment.
name: Miyoshi Yosshi
